title: "What are the hidden forces that cause pain and how can they be harnessed for healing?"
first_phrase: This text discusses how latent forces that reside deep within the body can be triggered to repair and regenerate damaged organs. When the organic unity of the body is threatened, these forces emerge and manifest as fever and pain. If the fear of the individual self were to be eliminated, these forces could be harnessed and used for direct magical and miraculous effects. The text references Milarepa, a renowned yogi, who was able to project and reabsorb poison from his body, further demonstrating the potential of these forces.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the key to unlocking the potential for miraculous healing lies in achieving a state of complete focus and awareness through intense introspection and a fearless willingness to confront and overcome one's own limitations. By doing so, the healing forces can flow directly into the self, bypassing the more conventional physiological systems and allowing for truly extraordinary outcomes.
